name: Inferno - All Nine Circles
description:
The Inferno of Dante!

Circles:

- First: Limbo
- Second: Lust
- Third: Gluttony
- Fourth: Greed
- Fifth: Wrath
- Sixth: Heresy
- Seventh: Violence
- Eighth: Fraud
- Ninth: Treachery

Control:

- Touch right to move the soul ball to the right
- Touch left to move the soul ball to the left
